function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Large-scale uptake of contact tracing apps may raise privacy concerns and lead to data breaches.","Impact":"Loss of trust in the technology and reluctance to use contact tracing apps, hindering pandemic control efforts.","Mitigation":"Implement strict data privacy regulations and encryption protocols to protect user data. Communicate transparently with the public about data security measures.","Technologies":"Data encryption, privacy-preserving algorithms, secure data storage and transmission protocols.","People":"General public, users of contact tracing apps.","Owner":"Government, technology companies, app developers."},{"Description":"Reliance on smart solutions such as surveillance systems and positioning technology may infringe on individual privacy and civil liberties.","Impact":"Erosion of privacy rights, public distrust, and resistance to surveillance measures.","Mitigation":"Establish clear legal frameworks and guidelines for the use of surveillance technology. Conduct regular privacy impact assessments and engage in public consultation.","Technologies":"Privacy-enhancing technologies, encryption, privacy-preserving surveillance methods.","People":"General public, individuals under surveillance.","Owner":"Government, regulatory authorities, technology providers."},{"Description":"Dependence on 5G networks for improved efficiency of tracking technologies may lead to concerns about electromagnetic radiation exposure and potential health risks.","Impact":"Risk of public resistance to 5G adoption, misinformation, and health anxiety.","Mitigation":"Carry out extensive public education on 5G technology, its safety measures, and health effects. Implement transparent monitoring and reporting of radiation levels.","Technologies":"Public health communication, radiation monitoring and reporting systems.","People":"General public, individuals exposed to 5G technology.","Owner":"Telecommunication companies, government health agencies."}]}
